traits.locale_text: "Немногие приходят к Богу-Императору в столь юном возрасте. Вы сделали непростой, но благочестивый выбор".

languages.text: "A difficult choice, but a righteous and devout one."

traits.locale_text: "A difficult choice, but a righteous one."
"A difficult choice, but a righteous one."
"A difficult choice, but a righteous and devout one."
"A difficult choice, but a righteous and devout one."
"A difficult choice, but a righteous and devout one."
"A difficult choice, but a righteous and devout one."

languages.text: « Un choix difficile, mais juste et fort pieux. »
languages.original_text: "A difficult choice, but a righteous and devout one."

traits.locale_text: « Un choix difficile, mais juste et fort pieux. »

languages.text: «Es una dura decisión, pero seguramente la más piadosa».
languages.original_text: "A difficult choice, but a righteous and devout one."

traits.locale_text: «Es una dura decisión, pero seguramente la más piadosa».

languages.text: 「難しい選択だが、正しく、忠実な選択だ」
languages.original_text: "A difficult choice, but a righteous and devout one."

traits.locale_text: 「難しい選択だが、正しく、忠実な選択だ」

languages.text: “那是个艰难的抉择，但也是正义而虔诚的抉择。”
languages.original_text: "A difficult choice, but a righteous and devout one."

traits.locale_text: “那是个艰难的抉择，但也是正义而虔诚的抉择。”

languages.text: "Eine schwierige Entscheidung, aber eine rechtschaffene und fromme."
languages.original_text: "A difficult choice, but a righteous and devout one."

traits.locale_text: "Eine schwierige Entscheidung, aber eine rechtschaffene und fromme."

languages.text: "Zor olsa da erdemli ve dine uygun bir seçim."
languages.original_text: "A difficult choice, but a righteous and devout one."
